Title: Relates to requiring certain perils be covered under certain business interruption insurance policies during the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic
Summary: Requires certain perils be covered under business interruption insurance policies issued to certain human services and community based health providers during the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to requiring certain perils be covered under business interruption insurance policies issued to certain human services and community-based health providers during the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic
